name: Dr. Elena Petrova
title: Cardiology Specialist
bio: Expert in cardiac rhythm disorders and preventive cardiology with over 15 years of clinical experience. Leads comprehensive heart health programs, mentors junior cardiologists, and collaborates with multidisciplinary teams to deliver holistic care. Passionate about patient education and long-term wellbeing.

name: Dr. Nina Patel
title: Interventional Cardiologist
bio: Performs complex cardiac interventions with a focus on minimally invasive procedures and rapid recovery.

name: Dr. Oliver Bennett
title: Heart Failure Specialist
bio: Focuses on advanced heart failure therapies and cardiac rehabilitation programs tailored to each patient.

name: Dr. Amelia Park
title: Electrophysiologist
bio: Leads minimally invasive procedures to correct heart rhythm conditions with cutting-edge technology.

name: Dr. Jacob Reid
title: Cardiothoracic Surgeon
bio: Performs complex cardiothoracic surgeries with an emphasis on enhanced recovery pathways and patient comfort.

name: Dr. David Kim
title: Pediatric Consultant
bio: Specializing in child development and common childhood illnesses. Dedicated to creating a comfortable environment for young patients.

name: Dr. Liam O'Connor
title: Neonatal Specialist
bio: Supports premature infants and their families with evidence-based neonatal care and long-term development planning.

name: Dr. Priya Kumar
title: Child Wellness Expert
bio: Leads preventive care programs and long-term wellness plans for growing children and families.

name: Dr. Sofia Morales
title: Adolescent Health Specialist
bio: Supports teens through preventive screenings and holistic care to promote lifelong wellbeing.

name: Dr. Anya Sharma
title: Dermatology Expert
bio: Focuses on advanced skin treatments and cosmetic dermatology. Committed to personalized care for all skin types.

name: Dr. Emilia Rossi
title: Dermatologic Surgeon
bio: Specializes in skin cancer treatment and cosmetic procedures with a focus on patient comfort and lasting outcomes.

name: Dr. James Carter
title: General Dermatologist
bio: Treats a wide range of skin conditions with emphasis on clear communication and tailored regimens.

name: Dr. Mark Johnson
title: Neurology Specialist
bio: Specializes in headache disorders and neurodegenerative diseases. Utilizes cutting-edge diagnostic techniques.

name: Dr. Selene Ito
title: Movement Disorder Specialist
bio: Provides advanced care plans for Parkinson's and movement disorders with a multidisciplinary team.

name: Dr. Farah Ahmed
title: Neuro Rehabilitation Expert
bio: Guides patients through recovery from stroke and spinal injuries with evidence-based therapies.

name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: Orthopedic Surgeon
bio: Leading expert in joint replacement and sports injury recovery. Dedicated to restoring mobility and improving quality of life.

name: Dr. Hassan Farooq
title: Sports Medicine Physician
bio: Helps athletes prevent and recover from injuries using advanced rehabilitation and performance programs.

name: Dr. Lucas Meyer
title: Spine Specialist
bio: Focuses on minimally invasive spine procedures with personalized recovery plans for every patient.

name: Dr. Maya Desai
title: Medical Oncologist
bio: Builds personalized cancer treatment plans and coordinates supportive care for patients and families.

name: Dr. Daniel Ross
title: Radiation Oncologist
bio: Provides advanced radiation therapies with precision imaging for fewer side effects and faster recoveries.
